Chemtrade Logistics to buy chemical maker Canexus
item.description: [Reuters] - Chemtrade Logistics Income Fund said it would buy chemicals and handling company Canexus Corp for C$1.65 in cash per share. The arrangement, which reflects an enterprise value of about C$900 million for ...

item.title: Chemtrade enters into agreement to acquire Canexus for $1.65 cash per share in a board-supported plan of arrangement
Canexus, Chemtrade in friendly talks after hostile bid
item.description: [Reuters] - Canadian chemical company Canexus Corp, which rejected a hostile bid from Chemtrade Logistics Income Fund, confirmed on Tuesday that it is in talks with the company about a higher offer. Chemtrade, a supplier of industrial chemicals, has increased its takeover offer to C$1.65 per share, Canexus said in a statement. Canexus rebuffed a C$1.50-per-share unsolicited offer in October, saying the C$297.2 million bid undervalued the company.
